alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Gwinnett; Rockdale; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 6:45PM EDT until August 24 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rockdale County in north central Georgia... East central DeKalb County in north central Georgia... Southeastern Gwinnett County in north central Georgia... Northwestern Walton County in north central Georgia... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 645 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Grayson, or 7 miles south of Lawrenceville, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lawrenceville, Snellville, Loganville, Grayson, Big Haynes Creek Park, and Rosebud. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
